headline: Is Blackstone (BX) Now Attractive After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Blackstone's current share price offers good value, it helps to step back and look at how the market has treated the stock over different timeframes and what that might say about expectations. At a last close of US$131.39, Blackstone's share price reflects a 1.8% decline over the past week, a 19.6% decline over 30 days, and a 17.3% decline year to date, set against longer term returns of 58.9% over 3 years and 124.9% over 5 years.
